vote.title: Authorize a decrease in the construction services contract with Roadway Solutions, Inc. for traffic signal construction of Warranted Traffic Signal Installation Group 5, to remove the construction of the traffic signal located at North Prairie Creek Road at Forney Road from the contract - Not to exceed ($312,035.00), from $1,297,982.00 to $985,947.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
